01192 /* ************************************************ */
01193 
01194 void uiBlockSetButLock(uiBlock *block, int val, const char *lockstr)
01195 {
01196     if (val) {
01197         block->lock = val ? 1 : 0;
01198         block->lockstr = lockstr;
01199     }
01200 }
01201 
01202 void uiBlockClearButLock(uiBlock *block)
01203 {
01204     block->lock = 0;
01205     block->lockstr = NULL;
01206 }
01207 
01208 /* *************************************************************** */
01209 
01210 void ui_delete_linkline(uiLinkLine *line, uiBut *but)
01211 {
01212     uiLink *link;
01213     int a, b;
01214     
01215     BLI_remlink(&but->link->lines, line);
01216 
01217     link = line->from->link;
01218 
01219     /* are there more pointers allowed? */
01220     if (link->ppoin) {
01221         
01222         if (*(link->totlink) == 1) {
01223             *(link->totlink) = 0;
01224             MEM_freeN(*(link->ppoin));
01225             *(link->ppoin) = NULL;
01226         }
01227         else {
01228             b = 0;
01229             for (a = 0; a < (*(link->totlink)); a++) {
01230                 
01231                 if ( (*(link->ppoin))[a] != line->to->poin) {
01232                     (*(link->ppoin))[b] = (*(link->ppoin))[a];
01233                     b++;
01234                 }
01235             }   
01236             (*(link->totlink))--;
01237         }
01238     }
01239     else {
01240         *(link->poin) = NULL;
01241     }
01242 
01243     MEM_freeN(line);
01244     //REDRAW
01245 }
01246 
01247 /* *********************** data get/set ***********************
01248  * this either works with the pointed to data, or can work with
01249  * an edit override pointer while dragging for example */
01250 
01251 /* for buttons pointing to color for example */
01252 void ui_get_but_vectorf(uiBut *but, float vec[3])
01253 {
01254     PropertyRNA *prop;
01255     int a, tot;
01256 
01257     if (but->editvec) {
01258         copy_v3_v3(vec, but->editvec);
01259     }
01260 
01261     if (but->rnaprop) {
01262         prop = but->rnaprop;
01263 
01264         vec[0] = vec[1] = vec[2] = 0.0f;
01265 
01266         if (RNA_property_type(prop) == PROP_FLOAT) {
01267             tot = RNA_property_array_length(&but->rnapoin, prop);
01268             tot = MIN2(tot, 3);
01269 
01270             for (a = 0; a < tot; a++)
01271                 vec[a] = RNA_property_float_get_index(&but->rnapoin, prop, a);
01272         }
01273     }
01274     else if (but->pointype == CHA) {
01275         char *cp = (char *)but->poin;
01276         vec[0] = ((float)cp[0]) / 255.0f;
01277         vec[1] = ((float)cp[1]) / 255.0f;
01278         vec[2] = ((float)cp[2]) / 255.0f;
01279     }
01280     else if (but->pointype == FLO) {
01281         float *fp = (float *)but->poin;
01282         copy_v3_v3(vec, fp);
01283     }
01284     else {
01285         if (but->editvec == NULL) {
01286             fprintf(stderr, "ui_get_but_vectorf: can't get color, should never happen\n");
01287             vec[0] = vec[1] = vec[2] = 0.0f;
01288         }
01289     }
01290 
01291     if (but->type == BUT_NORMAL) {
01292         normalize_v3(vec);
01293     }
01294 }
01295 
01296 /* for buttons pointing to color for example */
01297 void ui_set_but_vectorf(uiBut *but, const float vec[3])
01298 {
01299     PropertyRNA *prop;
01300 
01301     if (but->editvec) {
01302         copy_v3_v3(but->editvec, vec);
01303     }
01304 
01305     if (but->rnaprop) {
01306         prop = but->rnaprop;
01307 
01308         if (RNA_property_type(prop) == PROP_FLOAT) {
01309             int tot;
01310             int a;
01311 
01312             tot = RNA_property_array_length(&but->rnapoin, prop);
01313             tot = MIN2(tot, 3);
01314 
01315             for (a = 0; a < tot; a++) {
01316                 RNA_property_float_set_index(&but->rnapoin, prop, a, vec[a]);
01317             }
01318         }
01319     }
01320     else if (but->pointype == CHA) {
01321         char *cp = (char *)but->poin;
01322         cp[0] = (char)(0.5f + vec[0] * 255.0f);
01323         cp[1] = (char)(0.5f + vec[1] * 255.0f);
01324         cp[2] = (char)(0.5f + vec[2] * 255.0f);
01325     }
01326     else if (but->pointype == FLO) {
01327         float *fp = (float *)but->poin;
01328         copy_v3_v3(fp, vec);
01329     }
01330 }
01331 
01332 int ui_is_but_float(uiBut *but)
01333 {
01334     if (but->pointype == FLO && but->poin)
01335         return 1;
01336     
01337     if (but->rnaprop && RNA_property_type(but->rnaprop) == PROP_FLOAT)
01338         return 1;
01339     
01340     return 0;
01341 }
01342 
01343 int ui_is_but_unit(uiBut *but)
01344 {
01345     UnitSettings *unit = but->block->unit;
01346     const int unit_type = uiButGetUnitType(but);
01347 
01348     if (unit_type == PROP_UNIT_NONE)
01349         return 0;
01350 
01351 #if 1 // removed so angle buttons get correct snapping
01352     if (unit->system_rotation == USER_UNIT_ROT_RADIANS && unit_type == PROP_UNIT_ROTATION)
01353         return 0;
01354 #endif
01355     
01356     /* for now disable time unit conversion */  
01357     if (unit_type == PROP_UNIT_TIME)
01358         return 0;
01359 
01360     if (unit->system == USER_UNIT_NONE) {
01361         if (unit_type != PROP_UNIT_ROTATION) {
01362             return 0;
01363         }
01364     }
01365 
01366     return 1;
01367 }
01368 
01369 int ui_is_but_rna_valid(uiBut *but)
01370 {
01371     if (but->rnaprop == NULL || RNA_struct_contains_property(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop)) {
01372         return TRUE;
01373     }
01374     else {
01375         printf("property removed %s: %p\n", but->drawstr, but->rnaprop);
01376         return FALSE;
01377     }
01378 }
01379 
01380 double ui_get_but_val(uiBut *but)
01381 {
01382     PropertyRNA *prop;
01383     double value = 0.0;
01384 
01385     if (but->editval) { return *(but->editval); }
01386     if (but->poin == NULL && but->rnapoin.data == NULL) return 0.0;
01387 
01388     if (but->rnaprop) {
01389         prop = but->rnaprop;
01390 
01391         switch (RNA_property_type(prop)) {
01392             case PROP_BOOLEAN:
01393                 if (RNA_property_array_check(prop))
01394                     value = RNA_property_boolean_get_index(&but->rnapoin, prop, but->rnaindex);
01395                 else
01396                     value = RNA_property_boolean_get(&but->rnapoin, prop);
01397                 break;
01398             case PROP_INT:
01399                 if (RNA_property_array_check(prop))
01400                     value = RNA_property_int_get_index(&but->rnapoin, prop, but->rnaindex);
01401                 else
01402                     value = RNA_property_int_get(&but->rnapoin, prop);
01403                 break;
01404             case PROP_FLOAT:
01405                 if (RNA_property_array_check(prop))
01406                     value = RNA_property_float_get_index(&but->rnapoin, prop, but->rnaindex);
01407                 else
01408                     value = RNA_property_float_get(&but->rnapoin, prop);
01409                 break;
01410             case PROP_ENUM:
01411                 value = RNA_property_enum_get(&but->rnapoin, prop);
01412                 break;
01413             default:
01414                 value = 0.0;
01415                 break;
01416         }
01417     }
01418     else if (but->type == HSVSLI) {
01419         float h, s, v, *fp;
01420         
01421         fp = (but->editvec) ? but->editvec : (float *)but->poin;
01422         rgb_to_hsv(fp[0], fp[1], fp[2], &h, &s, &v);
01423 
01424         switch (but->str[0]) {
01425             case 'H': value = h; break;
01426             case 'S': value = s; break;
01427             case 'V': value = v; break;
01428         }
01429     } 
01430     else if (but->pointype == CHA) {
01431         value = *(char *)but->poin;
01432     }
01433     else if (but->pointype == SHO) {
01434         value = *(short *)but->poin;
01435     } 
01436     else if (but->pointype == INT) {
01437         value = *(int *)but->poin;
01438     } 
01439     else if (but->pointype == FLO) {
01440         value = *(float *)but->poin;
01441     }
01442 
01443     return value;
01444 }
01445 
01446 void ui_set_but_val(uiBut *but, double value)
01447 {
01448     PropertyRNA *prop;
01449 
01450     /* value is a hsv value: convert to rgb */
01451     if (but->rnaprop) {
01452         prop = but->rnaprop;
01453 
01454         if (RNA_property_editable(&but->rnapoin, prop)) {
01455             switch (RNA_property_type(prop)) {
01456                 case PROP_BOOLEAN:
01457                     if (RNA_property_array_length(&but->rnapoin, prop))
01458                         RNA_property_boolean_set_index(&but->rnapoin, prop, but->rnaindex, value);
01459                     else
01460                         RNA_property_boolean_set(&but->rnapoin, prop, value);
01461                     break;
01462                 case PROP_INT:
01463                     if (RNA_property_array_length(&but->rnapoin, prop))
01464                         RNA_property_int_set_index(&but->rnapoin, prop, but->rnaindex, (int)value);
01465                     else
01466                         RNA_property_int_set(&but->rnapoin, prop, (int)value);
01467                     break;
01468                 case PROP_FLOAT:
01469                     if (RNA_property_array_length(&but->rnapoin, prop))
01470                         RNA_property_float_set_index(&but->rnapoin, prop, but->rnaindex, value);
01471                     else
01472                         RNA_property_float_set(&but->rnapoin, prop, value);
01473                     break;
01474                 case PROP_ENUM:
01475                     if (RNA_property_flag(prop) & PROP_ENUM_FLAG) {
01476                         int ivalue = (int)value;
01477                         ivalue ^= RNA_property_enum_get(&but->rnapoin, prop); /* toggle for enum/flag buttons */
01478                         RNA_property_enum_set(&but->rnapoin, prop, ivalue);
01479                     }
01480                     else {
01481                         RNA_property_enum_set(&but->rnapoin, prop, value);
01482                     }
01483                     break;
01484                 default:
01485                     break;
01486             }
01487         }
01488 
01489         /* we can't be sure what RNA set functions actually do,
01490          * so leave this unset */
01491         value = UI_BUT_VALUE_UNSET;
01492     }
01493     else if (but->pointype == 0) ;
01494     else if (but->type == HSVSLI) {
01495         float h, s, v, *fp;
01496         
01497         fp = (but->editvec) ? but->editvec : (float *)but->poin;
01498         rgb_to_hsv(fp[0], fp[1], fp[2], &h, &s, &v);
01499         
01500         switch (but->str[0]) {
01501             case 'H': h = value; break;
01502             case 'S': s = value; break;
01503             case 'V': v = value; break;
01504         }
01505         
01506         hsv_to_rgb(h, s, v, fp, fp + 1, fp + 2);
01507         
01508     }
01509     else {
01510         /* first do rounding */
01511         if (but->pointype == CHA)
01512             value = (char)floor(value + 0.5);
01513         else if (but->pointype == SHO) {
01514             /* gcc 3.2.1 seems to have problems 
01515              * casting a double like 32772.0 to
01516              * a short so we cast to an int, then 
01517              * to a short */
01518             int gcckludge;
01519             gcckludge = (int) floor(value + 0.5);
01520             value = (short)gcckludge;
01521         }
01522         else if (but->pointype == INT)
01523             value = (int)floor(value + 0.5);
01524         else if (but->pointype == FLO) {
01525             float fval = (float)value;
01526             if (fval >= -0.00001f && fval <= 0.00001f) fval = 0.0f;  /* prevent negative zero */
01527             value = fval;
01528         }
01529         
01530         /* then set value with possible edit override */
01531         if (but->editval)
01532             value = *but->editval = value;
01533         else if (but->pointype == CHA)
01534             value = *((char *)but->poin) = (char)value;
01535         else if (but->pointype == SHO)
01536             value = *((short *)but->poin) = (short)value;
01537         else if (but->pointype == INT)
01538             value = *((int *)but->poin) = (int)value;
01539         else if (but->pointype == FLO)
01540             value = *((float *)but->poin) = (float)value;
01541     }
01542 
01543     /* update select flag */
01544     ui_is_but_sel(but, &value);
01545 }
01546 
01547 int ui_get_but_string_max_length(uiBut *but)
01548 {
01549     if (ELEM(but->type, TEX, SEARCH_MENU))
01550         return but->hardmax;
01551     else if (but->type == IDPOIN)
01552         return MAX_ID_NAME - 2;
01553     else
01554         return UI_MAX_DRAW_STR;
01555 }
01556 
01557 static double ui_get_but_scale_unit(uiBut *but, double value)
01558 {
01559     UnitSettings *unit = but->block->unit;
01560     int unit_type = uiButGetUnitType(but);
01561 
01562     if (unit_type == PROP_UNIT_LENGTH) {
01563         return value * (double)unit->scale_length;
01564     }
01565     else if (unit_type == PROP_UNIT_AREA) {
01566         return value * pow(unit->scale_length, 2);
01567     }
01568     else if (unit_type == PROP_UNIT_VOLUME) {
01569         return value * pow(unit->scale_length, 3);
01570     }
01571     else if (unit_type == PROP_UNIT_TIME) { /* WARNING - using evil_C :| */
01572         Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(but->block->evil_C);
01573         return FRA2TIME(value);
01574     }
01575     else {
01576         return value;
01577     }
01578 }
01579 
01580 /* str will be overwritten */
01581 void ui_convert_to_unit_alt_name(uiBut *but, char *str, size_t maxlen)
01582 {
01583     if (ui_is_but_unit(but)) {
01584         UnitSettings *unit = but->block->unit;
01585         int unit_type = uiButGetUnitType(but);
01586         char *orig_str;
01587         
01588         orig_str = MEM_callocN(sizeof(char) * maxlen + 1, "textedit sub str");
01589         memcpy(orig_str, str, maxlen);
01590         
01591         bUnit_ToUnitAltName(str, maxlen, orig_str, unit->system, RNA_SUBTYPE_UNIT_VALUE(unit_type));
01592         
01593         MEM_freeN(orig_str);
01594     }
01595 }
01596 
01597 static void ui_get_but_string_unit(uiBut *but, char *str, int len_max, double value, int pad)
01598 {
01599     UnitSettings *unit = but->block->unit;
01600     int do_split = unit->flag & USER_UNIT_OPT_SPLIT;
01601     int unit_type = uiButGetUnitType(but);
01602     int precision = but->a2;
01603 
01604     if (unit->scale_length < 0.0001f) unit->scale_length = 1.0f;  // XXX do_versions
01605 
01606     /* Sanity checks */
01607     if (precision > PRECISION_FLOAT_MAX) precision = PRECISION_FLOAT_MAX;
01608     else if (precision == 0) precision = 2;
01609 
01610     bUnit_AsString(str, len_max, ui_get_but_scale_unit(but, value), precision,
01611                    unit->system, RNA_SUBTYPE_UNIT_VALUE(unit_type), do_split, pad);
01612 }
01613 
01614 static float ui_get_but_step_unit(uiBut *but, float step_default)
01615 {
01616     int unit_type = RNA_SUBTYPE_UNIT_VALUE(uiButGetUnitType(but));
01617     float step;
01618 
01619     step = bUnit_ClosestScalar(ui_get_but_scale_unit(but, step_default), but->block->unit->system, unit_type);
01620 
01621     if (step > 0.0f) { /* -1 is an error value */
01622         return (float)((double)step / ui_get_but_scale_unit(but, 1.0)) * 100.0f;
01623     }
01624     else {
01625         return step_default;
01626     }
01627 }
01628 
01629 
01630 void ui_get_but_string(uiBut *but, char *str, size_t maxlen)
01631 {
01632     if (but->rnaprop && ELEM3(but->type, TEX, IDPOIN, SEARCH_MENU)) {
01633         PropertyType type;
01634         char *buf = NULL;
01635         int buf_len;
01636 
01637         type = RNA_property_type(but->rnaprop);
01638 
01639         if (type == PROP_STRING) {
01640             /* RNA string */
01641             buf = RNA_property_string_get_alloc(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop, str, maxlen, &buf_len);
01642         }
01643         else if (type == PROP_POINTER) {
01644             /* RNA pointer */
01645             PointerRNA ptr = RNA_property_pointer_get(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop);
01646             buf = RNA_struct_name_get_alloc(&ptr, str, maxlen, &buf_len);
01647         }
01648 
01649         if (!buf) {
01650             str[0] = '\0';
01651         }
01652         else if (buf && buf != str) {
01653             /* string was too long, we have to truncate */
01654             memcpy(str, buf, MIN2(maxlen, buf_len + 1));
01655             MEM_freeN(buf);
01656         }
01657     }
01658     else if (but->type == IDPOIN) {
01659         /* ID pointer */
01660         if (but->idpoin_idpp) { /* Can be NULL for ID properties by python */
01661             ID *id = *(but->idpoin_idpp);
01662             if (id) {
01663                 BLI_strncpy(str, id->name + 2, maxlen);
01664                 return;
01665             }
01666         }
01667         str[0] = '\0';
01668         return;
01669     }
01670     else if (but->type == TEX) {
01671         /* string */
01672         BLI_strncpy(str, but->poin, maxlen);
01673         return;
01674     }
01675     else if (but->type == SEARCH_MENU) {
01676         /* string */
01677         BLI_strncpy(str, but->poin, maxlen);
01678         return;
01679     }
01680     else if (ui_but_anim_expression_get(but, str, maxlen))
01681         ;  /* driver expression */
01682     else {
01683         /* number editing */
01684         double value;
01685 
01686         value = ui_get_but_val(but);
01687 
01688         if (ui_is_but_float(but)) {
01689             if (ui_is_but_unit(but)) {
01690                 ui_get_but_string_unit(but, str, maxlen, value, 0);
01691             }
01692             else {
01693                 const int prec = ui_but_float_precision(but, value);
01694                 BLI_snprintf(str, maxlen, "%.*f", prec, value);
01695             }
01696         }
01697         else
01698             BLI_snprintf(str, maxlen, "%d", (int)value);
01699     }
01700 }
01701 
01702 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
01703 
01704 static int ui_set_but_string_eval_num_unit(bContext *C, uiBut *but, const char *str, double *value)
01705 {
01706     char str_unit_convert[256];
01707     const int unit_type = uiButGetUnitType(but);
01708 
01709     BLI_strncpy(str_unit_convert, str, sizeof(str_unit_convert));
01710 
01711     /* ugly, use the draw string to get the value,
01712      * this could cause problems if it includes some text which resolves to a unit */
01713     bUnit_ReplaceString(str_unit_convert, sizeof(str_unit_convert), but->drawstr,
01714                         ui_get_but_scale_unit(but, 1.0), but->block->unit->system, RNA_SUBTYPE_UNIT_VALUE(unit_type));
01715 
01716     return (BPY_button_exec(C, str_unit_convert, value, TRUE) != -1);
01717 }
01718 
01719 #endif /* WITH_PYTHON */
01720 
01721 
01722 int ui_set_but_string_eval_num(bContext *C, uiBut *but, const char *str, double *value)
01723 {
01724     int ok = FALSE;
01725 
01726 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
01727 
01728     if (str[0] != '\0') {
01729         int is_unit_but = ui_is_but_unit(but);
01730         /* only enable verbose if we won't run again with units */
01731         if (BPY_button_exec(C, str, value, is_unit_but == FALSE) != -1) {
01732             /* if the value parsed ok without unit conversion this button may still need a unit multiplier */
01733             if (is_unit_but) {
01734                 char str_new[128];
01735 
01736                 BLI_snprintf(str_new, sizeof(str_new), "%f", *value);
01737                 ok = ui_set_but_string_eval_num_unit(C, but, str_new, value);
01738             }
01739             else {
01740                 ok = TRUE; /* parse normal string via py (no unit conversion needed) */
01741             }
01742         }
01743         else if (is_unit_but) {
01744             /* parse failed, this is a unit but so run replacements and parse again */
01745             ok = ui_set_but_string_eval_num_unit(C, but, str, value);
01746         }
01747     }
01748 
01749 #else /* WITH_PYTHON */
01750 
01751     *value = atof(str);
01752     ok = TRUE;
01753 
01754     (void)C;
01755     (void)but;
01756 
01757 #endif /* WITH_PYTHON */
01758 
01759     return ok;
01760 }
01761 
01762 
01763 int ui_set_but_string(bContext *C, uiBut *but, const char *str)
01764 {
01765     if (but->rnaprop && ELEM3(but->type, TEX, IDPOIN, SEARCH_MENU)) {
01766         if (RNA_property_editable(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop)) {
01767             PropertyType type;
01768 
01769             type = RNA_property_type(but->rnaprop);
01770 
01771             if (type == PROP_STRING) {
01772                 /* RNA string */
01773                 RNA_property_string_set(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop, str);
01774                 return 1;
01775             }
01776             else if (type == PROP_POINTER) {
01777                 /* RNA pointer */
01778                 PointerRNA ptr, rptr;
01779                 PropertyRNA *prop;
01780 
01781                 if (str == NULL || str[0] == '\0') {
01782                     RNA_property_pointer_set(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop, PointerRNA_NULL);
01783                     return 1;
01784                 }
01785                 else {
01786                     ptr = but->rnasearchpoin;
01787                     prop = but->rnasearchprop;
01788                     
01789                     if (prop && RNA_property_collection_lookup_string(&ptr, prop, str, &rptr))
01790                         RNA_property_pointer_set(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop, rptr);
01791 
01792                     return 1;
01793                 }
01794 
01795                 return 0;
01796             }
01797         }
01798     }
01799     else if (but->type == IDPOIN) {
01800         /* ID pointer */
01801         but->idpoin_func(C, str, but->idpoin_idpp);
01802         return 1;
01803     }
01804     else if (but->type == TEX) {
01805         /* string */
01806         if (ui_is_but_utf8(but)) BLI_strncpy_utf8(but->poin, str, but->hardmax);
01807         else BLI_strncpy(but->poin, str, but->hardmax);
01808 
01809         return 1;
01810     }
01811     else if (but->type == SEARCH_MENU) {
01812         /* string */
01813         BLI_strncpy(but->poin, str, but->hardmax);
01814         return 1;
01815     }
01816     else if (ui_but_anim_expression_set(but, str)) {
01817         /* driver expression */
01818         return 1;
01819     }
01820     else if (str[0] == '#') {
01821         /* shortcut to create new driver expression (versus immediate Py-execution) */
01822         return ui_but_anim_expression_create(but, str + 1);
01823     }
01824     else {
01825         /* number editing */
01826         double value;
01827 
01828         if (ui_set_but_string_eval_num(C, but, str, &value) == FALSE) {
01829             return 0;
01830         }
01831 
01832         if (!ui_is_but_float(but)) value = (int)floor(value + 0.5);
01833         if (but->type == NUMABS) value = fabs(value);
01834 
01835         /* not that we use hard limits here */
01836         if (value < (double)but->hardmin) value = but->hardmin;
01837         if (value > (double)but->hardmax) value = but->hardmax;
01838 
01839         ui_set_but_val(but, value);
01840         return 1;
01841     }
01842 
01843     return 0;
01844 }
01845 
01846 void ui_set_but_default(bContext *C, short all)
01847 {
01848     PointerRNA ptr;
01849 
01850     WM_operator_properties_create(&ptr, "UI_OT_reset_default_button");
01851     RNA_boolean_set(&ptr, "all", all);
01852     WM_operator_name_call(C, "UI_OT_reset_default_button", WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, &ptr);
01853     WM_operator_properties_free(&ptr);
01854 }
01855 
01856 static double soft_range_round_up(double value, double max)
01857 {
01858     /* round up to .., 0.1, 0.2, 0.5, 1, 2, 5, 10, 20, 50, .. */
01859     double newmax = pow(10.0, ceil(log(value) / M_LN10));
01860 
01861     if (newmax * 0.2 >= max && newmax * 0.2 >= value)
01862         return newmax * 0.2;
01863     else if (newmax * 0.5 >= max && newmax * 0.5 >= value)
01864         return newmax * 0.5;
01865     else
01866         return newmax;
01867 }
01868 
01869 static double soft_range_round_down(double value, double max)
01870 {
01871     /* round down to .., 0.1, 0.2, 0.5, 1, 2, 5, 10, 20, 50, .. */
01872     double newmax = pow(10.0, floor(log(value) / M_LN10));
01873 
01874     if (newmax * 5.0 <= max && newmax * 5.0 <= value)
01875         return newmax * 5.0;
01876     else if (newmax * 2.0 <= max && newmax * 2.0 <= value)
01877         return newmax * 2.0;
01878     else
01879         return newmax;
01880 }
01881 
01882 void ui_set_but_soft_range(uiBut *but, double value)
01883 {
01884     /* ideally we would not limit this but practically, its more then
01885      * enough worst case is very long vectors wont use a smart soft-range
01886      * which isn't so bad. */
01887 
01888     if (but->rnaprop) {
01889         const PropertyType type = RNA_property_type(but->rnaprop);
01890         double softmin, softmax /*, step, precision*/;
01891         double value_min = value;
01892         double value_max = value;
01893 
01894         /* clamp button range to something reasonable in case
01895          * we get -inf/inf from RNA properties */
01896         if (type == PROP_INT) {
01897             int imin, imax, istep;
01898             const int array_len = RNA_property_array_length(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop);
01899 
01900             RNA_property_int_ui_range(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop, &imin, &imax, &istep);
01901             softmin = (imin == INT_MIN) ? -1e4 : imin;
01902             softmax = (imin == INT_MAX) ? 1e4 : imax;
01903             /*step= istep;*/ /*UNUSED*/
01904             /*precision= 1;*/ /*UNUSED*/
01905 
01906             if (array_len >= 2) {
01907                 int value_range[2];
01908                 RNA_property_int_get_array_range(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop, value_range);
01909                 value_min = (double)value_range[0];
01910                 value_max = (double)value_range[1];
01911             }
01912         }
01913         else if (type == PROP_FLOAT) {
01914             float fmin, fmax, fstep, fprecision;
01915             const int array_len = RNA_property_array_length(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop);
01916 
01917             RNA_property_float_ui_range(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop, &fmin, &fmax, &fstep, &fprecision);
01918             softmin = (fmin == -FLT_MAX) ? (float)-1e4 : fmin;
01919             softmax = (fmax == FLT_MAX) ? (float)1e4 : fmax;
01920             /*step= fstep;*/ /*UNUSED*/
01921             /*precision= fprecision;*/ /*UNUSED*/
01922 
01923             if (array_len >= 2) {
01924                 float value_range[2];
01925                 RNA_property_float_get_array_range(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop, value_range);
01926                 value_min = (double)value_range[0];
01927                 value_max = (double)value_range[1];
01928             }
01929         }
01930         else
01931             return;
01932 
01933         /* if the value goes out of the soft/max range, adapt the range */
01934         if (value_min + 1e-10 < softmin) {
01935             if (value_min < 0.0)
01936                 softmin = -soft_range_round_up(-value_min, -softmin);
01937             else
01938                 softmin = soft_range_round_down(value_min, softmin);
01939 
01940             if (softmin < (double)but->hardmin)
01941                 softmin = (double)but->hardmin;
01942         }
01943         if (value_max - 1e-10 > softmax) {
01944             if (value_max < 0.0)
01945                 softmax = -soft_range_round_down(-value_max, -softmax);
01946             else
01947                 softmax = soft_range_round_up(value_max, softmax);
01948 
01949             if (softmax > (double)but->hardmax)
01950                 softmax = but->hardmax;
01951         }
01952 
01953         but->softmin = softmin;
01954         but->softmax = softmax;
01955     }
01956 }
01957 
01958 /* ******************* Free ********************/
01959 
01960 static void ui_free_link(uiLink *link)
01961 {
01962     if (link) { 
01963         BLI_freelistN(&link->lines);
01964         MEM_freeN(link);
01965     }
01966 }
01967 
01968 /* can be called with C==NULL */
01969 static void ui_free_but(const bContext *C, uiBut *but)
01970 {
01971     if (but->opptr) {
01972         WM_operator_properties_free(but->opptr);
01973         MEM_freeN(but->opptr);
01974     }
01975 
01976     if (but->func_argN) {
01977         MEM_freeN(but->func_argN);
01978     }
01979 
01980     if (but->active) {
01981         /* XXX solve later, buttons should be free-able without context ideally,
01982          * however they may have open tooltips or popup windows, which need to
01983          * be closed using a context pointer */
01984         if (C) {
01985             ui_button_active_free(C, but);
01986         }
01987         else {
01988             if (but->active) {
01989                 MEM_freeN(but->active);
01990             }
01991         }
01992     }
01993     if (but->str && but->str != but->strdata) {
01994         MEM_freeN(but->str);
01995     }
01996     ui_free_link(but->link);
01997 
01998     if ((but->type == BUT_IMAGE) && but->poin) {
01999         IMB_freeImBuf((struct ImBuf *)but->poin);
02000     }
02001 
02002     MEM_freeN(but);
02003 }
02004 
02005 /* can be called with C==NULL */
02006 void uiFreeBlock(const bContext *C, uiBlock *block)
02007 {
02008     uiBut *but;
02009 
02010     while ( (but = block->buttons.first) ) {
02011         BLI_remlink(&block->buttons, but);  
02012         ui_free_but(C, but);
02013     }
02014 
02015     if (block->unit) {
02016         MEM_freeN(block->unit);
02017     }
02018 
02019     if (block->func_argN) {
02020         MEM_freeN(block->func_argN);
02021     }
02022 
02023     CTX_store_free_list(&block->contexts);
02024 
02025     BLI_freelistN(&block->saferct);
02026     
02027     MEM_freeN(block);
02028 }
02029 
02030 /* can be called with C==NULL */
02031 void uiFreeBlocks(const bContext *C, ListBase *lb)
02032 {
02033     uiBlock *block;
02034     
02035     while ( (block = lb->first) ) {
02036         BLI_remlink(lb, block);
02037         uiFreeBlock(C, block);
02038     }
02039 }
02040 
02041 void uiFreeInactiveBlocks(const bContext *C, ListBase *lb)
02042 {
02043     uiBlock *block, *nextblock;
02044 
02045     for (block = lb->first; block; block = nextblock) {
02046         nextblock = block->next;
02047     
02048         if (!block->handle) {
02049             if (!block->active) {
02050                 BLI_remlink(lb, block);
02051                 uiFreeBlock(C, block);
02052             }
02053             else
02054                 block->active = 0;
02055         }
02056     }
02057 }
02058 
02059 void uiBlockSetRegion(uiBlock *block, ARegion *region)
02060 {
02061     ListBase *lb = &region->uiblocks;
02062     uiBlock *oldblock = NULL;
02063 
02064     /* each listbase only has one block with this name, free block
02065      * if is already there so it can be rebuilt from scratch */
02066     if (lb) {
02067         oldblock = BLI_findstring(lb, block->name, offsetof(uiBlock, name));
02068 
02069         if (oldblock) {
02070             oldblock->active = 0;
02071             oldblock->panel = NULL;
02072         }
02073 
02074         /* at the beginning of the list! for dynamical menus/blocks */
02075         BLI_addhead(lb, block);
02076     }
02077 
02078     block->oldblock = oldblock;
02079 }
02080 
02081 uiBlock *uiBeginBlock(const bContext *C, ARegion *region, const char *name, short dt)
02082 {
02083     uiBlock *block;
02084     wmWindow *window;
02085     Scene *scn;
02086     int getsizex, getsizey;
02087 
02088     window = CTX_wm_window(C);
02089     scn = CTX_data_scene(C);
02090 
02091     block = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiBlock), "uiBlock");
02092     block->active = 1;
02093     block->dt = dt;
02094     block->evil_C = (void *)C; // XXX
02095 
02096     if (scn) {
02097         block->color_profile = (scn->r.color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT);
02098 
02099         /* copy to avoid crash when scene gets deleted with ui still open */
02100         block->unit = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(scn->unit), "UI UnitSettings");
02101         memcpy(block->unit, &scn->unit, sizeof(scn->unit));
02102     }
02103 
02104     BLI_strncpy(block->name, name, sizeof(block->name));
02105 
02106     if (region)
02107         uiBlockSetRegion(block, region);
02108 
02109     /* window matrix and aspect */
02110     if (region && region->swinid) {
02111         wm_subwindow_getmatrix(window, region->swinid, block->winmat);
02112         wm_subwindow_getsize(window, region->swinid, &getsizex, &getsizey);
02113 
02114         /* TODO - investigate why block->winmat[0][0] is negative
02115          * in the image view when viewRedrawForce is called */
02116         block->aspect = 2.0 / fabs( (getsizex) * block->winmat[0][0]);
02117     }
02118     else {
02119         /* no subwindow created yet, for menus for example, so we
02120          * use the main window instead, since buttons are created
02121          * there anyway */
02122         wm_subwindow_getmatrix(window, window->screen->mainwin, block->winmat);
02123         wm_subwindow_getsize(window, window->screen->mainwin, &getsizex, &getsizey);
02124 
02125         block->aspect = 2.0 / fabs(getsizex * block->winmat[0][0]);
02126         block->auto_open = TRUE;
02127         block->flag |= UI_BLOCK_LOOP; /* tag as menu */
02128     }
02129 
02130     return block;
02131 }
02132 
02133 uiBlock *uiGetBlock(const char *name, ARegion *ar)
02134 {
02135     return BLI_findstring(&ar->uiblocks, name, offsetof(uiBlock, name));
02136 }
02137 
02138 void uiBlockSetEmboss(uiBlock *block, char dt)
02139 {
02140     block->dt = dt;
02141 }
02142 
02143 void ui_check_but(uiBut *but)
02144 {
02145     /* if something changed in the button */
02146     double value = UI_BUT_VALUE_UNSET;
02147 //  float okwidth; // UNUSED
02148     
02149     ui_is_but_sel(but, &value);
02150     
02151     /* only update soft range while not editing */
02152     if (but->rnaprop && !(but->editval || but->editstr || but->editvec)) {
02153         UI_GET_BUT_VALUE_INIT(but, value)
02154         ui_set_but_soft_range(but, value);
02155     }
02156 
02157     /* test for min and max, icon sliders, etc */
02158     switch (but->type) {
02159         case NUM:
02160         case SLI:
02161         case SCROLL:
02162         case NUMSLI:
02163         case HSVSLI:
02164             UI_GET_BUT_VALUE_INIT(but, value)
02165             if (value < (double)but->hardmin) ui_set_but_val(but, but->hardmin);
02166             else if (value > (double)but->hardmax) ui_set_but_val(but, but->hardmax);
02167             break;
02168             
02169         case NUMABS:
02170         {
02171             double value_abs;
02172             UI_GET_BUT_VALUE_INIT(but, value)
02173             value_abs = fabs(value);
02174             if (value_abs < (double)but->hardmin) ui_set_but_val(but, but->hardmin);
02175             else if (value_abs > (double)but->hardmax) ui_set_but_val(but, but->hardmax);
02176             break;
02177         }
02178         case ICONTOG: 
02179         case ICONTOGN:
02180             if (!but->rnaprop || (RNA_property_flag(but->rnaprop) & PROP_ICONS_CONSECUTIVE)) {
02181                 if (but->flag & UI_SELECT) but->iconadd = 1;
02182                 else but->iconadd = 0;
02183             }
02184             break;
02185             
02186         case ICONROW:
02187             if (!but->rnaprop || (RNA_property_flag(but->rnaprop) & PROP_ICONS_CONSECUTIVE)) {
02188                 UI_GET_BUT_VALUE_INIT(but, value)
02189                 but->iconadd = (int)value - (int)(but->hardmin);
02190             }
02191             break;
02192             
02193         case ICONTEXTROW:
02194             if (!but->rnaprop || (RNA_property_flag(but->rnaprop) & PROP_ICONS_CONSECUTIVE)) {
02195                 UI_GET_BUT_VALUE_INIT(but, value)
02196                 but->iconadd = (int)value - (int)(but->hardmin);
02197             }
02198             break;
02199     }
02200     
02201     
02202     /* safety is 4 to enable small number buttons (like 'users') */
02203     // okwidth= -4 + (but->x2 - but->x1); // UNUSED
02204     
02205     /* name: */
02206     switch (but->type) {
02207     
02208         case MENU:
02209         case ICONTEXTROW:
02210         
02211             if (but->x2 - but->x1 > 24) {
02212                 UI_GET_BUT_VALUE_INIT(but, value)
02213                 ui_set_name_menu(but, (int)value);
02214             }
02215             break;
02216     
02217         case NUM:
02218         case NUMSLI:
02219         case HSVSLI:
02220         case NUMABS:
02221 
02222             UI_GET_BUT_VALUE_INIT(but, value)
02223 
02224             if (ui_is_but_float(but)) {
02225                 if (value == (double) FLT_MAX) BLI_snprintf(but->drawstr, sizeof(but->drawstr), "%sinf", but->str);
02226                 else if (value == (double) -FLT_MAX) BLI_snprintf(but->drawstr, sizeof(but->drawstr), "%s-inf", but->str);
02227                 /* support length type buttons */
02228                 else if (ui_is_but_unit(but)) {
02229                     char new_str[sizeof(but->drawstr)];
02230                     ui_get_but_string_unit(but, new_str, sizeof(new_str), value, TRUE);
02231                     BLI_snprintf(but->drawstr, sizeof(but->drawstr), "%s%s", but->str, new_str);
02232                 }
02233                 else {
02234                     const int prec = ui_but_float_precision(but, value);
02235                     BLI_snprintf(but->drawstr, sizeof(but->drawstr), "%s%.*f", but->str, prec, value);
02236                 }
02237             }
02238             else {
02239                 BLI_snprintf(but->drawstr, sizeof(but->drawstr), "%s%d", but->str, (int)value);
02240             }
02241             
02242             if (but->rnaprop) {
02243                 PropertySubType pstype = RNA_property_subtype(but->rnaprop);
02244             
02245                 if (pstype == PROP_PERCENTAGE)
02246                     strcat(but->drawstr, "%");
02247             }
02248             break;
02249 
02250         case LABEL:
02251             if (ui_is_but_float(but)) {
02252                 int prec;
02253                 UI_GET_BUT_VALUE_INIT(but, value)
02254                 prec = ui_but_float_precision(but, value);
02255                 BLI_snprintf(but->drawstr, sizeof(but->drawstr), "%s%.*f", but->str, prec, value);
02256             }
02257             else {
02258                 BLI_strncpy(but->drawstr, but->str, UI_MAX_DRAW_STR);
02259             }
02260         
02261             break;
02262 
02263         case IDPOIN:
02264         case TEX:
02265         case SEARCH_MENU:
02266             if (!but->editstr) {
02267                 char str[UI_MAX_DRAW_STR];
02268 
02269                 ui_get_but_string(but, str, UI_MAX_DRAW_STR - strlen(but->str));
02270 
02271                 BLI_snprintf(but->drawstr, sizeof(but->drawstr), "%s%s", but->str, str);
02272             }
02273             break;
02274     
02275         case KEYEVT:
02276             BLI_strncpy(but->drawstr, but->str, UI_MAX_DRAW_STR);
02277             if (but->flag & UI_SELECT) {
02278                 strcat(but->drawstr, "Press a key");
02279             }
02280             else {
02281                 UI_GET_BUT_VALUE_INIT(but, value)
02282                 strcat(but->drawstr, WM_key_event_string((short)value));
02283             }
02284             break;
02285         
02286         case HOTKEYEVT:
02287             if (but->flag & UI_SELECT) {
02288                 but->drawstr[0] = '\0';
02289 
02290                 if (but->modifier_key) {
02291                     char *str = but->drawstr;
02292 
02293                     if (but->modifier_key & KM_SHIFT)
02294                         str = strcat(str, "Shift ");
02295                     if (but->modifier_key & KM_CTRL)
02296                         str = strcat(str, "Ctrl ");
02297                     if (but->modifier_key & KM_ALT)
02298                         str = strcat(str, "Alt ");
02299                     if (but->modifier_key & KM_OSKEY)
02300                         str = strcat(str, "Cmd ");
02301 
02302                     (void)str; /* UNUSED */
02303                 }
02304                 else
02305                     strcat(but->drawstr, "Press a key  ");
02306             }
02307             else
02308                 BLI_strncpy(but->drawstr, but->str, UI_MAX_DRAW_STR);
02309 
02310             break;
02311 
02312         case BUT_TOGDUAL:
02313             /* trying to get the dual-icon to left of text... not very nice */
02314             if (but->str[0]) {
02315                 BLI_strncpy(but->drawstr, "  ", UI_MAX_DRAW_STR);
02316                 BLI_strncpy(but->drawstr + 2, but->str, UI_MAX_DRAW_STR - 2);
02317             }
02318             break;
02319         
02320         case HSVCUBE:
02321         case HSVCIRCLE:
02322             break;
02323         default:
02324             BLI_strncpy(but->drawstr, but->str, UI_MAX_DRAW_STR);
02325         
02326     }
02327 
02328     /* if we are doing text editing, this will override the drawstr */
02329     if (but->editstr)
02330         BLI_strncpy(but->drawstr, but->editstr, UI_MAX_DRAW_STR);
02331     
02332     /* text clipping moved to widget drawing code itself */
02333 }
02334 
02335 
02336 void uiBlockBeginAlign(uiBlock *block)
02337 {
02338     /* if other align was active, end it */
02339     if (block->flag & UI_BUT_ALIGN) uiBlockEndAlign(block);
02340 
02341     block->flag |= UI_BUT_ALIGN_DOWN;   
02342     block->alignnr++;
02343 
02344     /* buttons declared after this call will get this align nr */ // XXX flag?
02345 }
02346 
02347 static int buts_are_horiz(uiBut *but1, uiBut *but2)
02348 {
02349     float dx, dy;
02350     
02351     dx = fabs(but1->x2 - but2->x1);
02352     dy = fabs(but1->y1 - but2->y2);
02353     
02354     if (dx > dy) return 0;
02355     return 1;
02356 }
02357 
02358 void uiBlockEndAlign(uiBlock *block)
02359 {
02360     block->flag &= ~UI_BUT_ALIGN;   // all 4 flags
02361 }
02362 
02363 int ui_but_can_align(uiBut *but)
02364 {
02365     return !ELEM3(but->type, LABEL, OPTION, OPTIONN);
02366 }
02367 
02368 static void ui_block_do_align_but(uiBut *first, short nr)
02369 {
02370     uiBut *prev, *but = NULL, *next;
02371     int flag = 0, cols = 0, rows = 0;
02372     
02373     /* auto align */
02374 
02375     for (but = first; but && but->alignnr == nr; but = but->next) {
02376         if (but->next && but->next->alignnr == nr) {
02377             if (buts_are_horiz(but, but->next)) cols++;
02378             else rows++;
02379         }
02380     }
02381 
02382     /* rows==0: 1 row, cols==0: 1 column */
02383     
02384     /* note;  how it uses 'flag' in loop below (either set it, or OR it) is confusing */
02385     for (but = first, prev = NULL; but && but->alignnr == nr; prev = but, but = but->next) {
02386         next = but->next;
02387         if (next && next->alignnr != nr)
02388             next = NULL;
02389 
02390         /* clear old flag */
02391         but->flag &= ~UI_BUT_ALIGN;
02392             
02393         if (flag == 0) {  /* first case */
02394             if (next) {
02395                 if (buts_are_horiz(but, next)) {
02396                     if (rows == 0)
02397                         flag = UI_BUT_ALIGN_RIGHT;
02398                     else 
02399                         flag = UI_BUT_ALIGN_DOWN | UI_BUT_ALIGN_RIGHT;
02400                 }
02401                 else {
02402                     flag = UI_BUT_ALIGN_DOWN;
02403                 }
02404             }
02405         }
02406         else if (next == NULL) {  /* last case */
02407             if (prev) {
02408                 if (buts_are_horiz(prev, but)) {
02409                     if (rows == 0)
02410                         flag = UI_BUT_ALIGN_LEFT;
02411                     else
02412                         flag = UI_BUT_ALIGN_TOP | UI_BUT_ALIGN_LEFT;
02413                 }
02414                 else flag = UI_BUT_ALIGN_TOP;
02415             }
02416         }
02417         else if (buts_are_horiz(but, next)) {
02418             /* check if this is already second row */
02419             if (prev && buts_are_horiz(prev, but) == 0) {
02420                 flag &= ~UI_BUT_ALIGN_LEFT;
02421                 flag |= UI_BUT_ALIGN_TOP;
02422                 /* exception case: bottom row */
02423                 if (rows > 0) {
02424                     uiBut *bt = but;
02425                     while (bt && bt->alignnr == nr) {
02426                         if (bt->next && bt->next->alignnr == nr && buts_are_horiz(bt, bt->next) == 0) break;
02427                         bt = bt->next;
02428                     }
02429                     if (bt == NULL || bt->alignnr != nr) flag = UI_BUT_ALIGN_TOP | UI_BUT_ALIGN_RIGHT;
02430                 }
02431             }
02432             else flag |= UI_BUT_ALIGN_LEFT;
02433         }
02434         else {
02435             if (cols == 0) {
02436                 flag |= UI_BUT_ALIGN_TOP;
02437             }
02438             else {  /* next button switches to new row */
02439                 
02440                 if (prev && buts_are_horiz(prev, but))
02441                     flag |= UI_BUT_ALIGN_LEFT;
02442                 else {
02443                     flag &= ~UI_BUT_ALIGN_LEFT;
02444                     flag |= UI_BUT_ALIGN_TOP;
02445                 }
02446                 
02447                 if ( (flag & UI_BUT_ALIGN_TOP) == 0) {    /* stil top row */
02448                     if (prev) {
02449                         if (next && buts_are_horiz(but, next))
02450                             flag = UI_BUT_ALIGN_DOWN | UI_BUT_ALIGN_LEFT | UI_BUT_ALIGN_RIGHT;
02451                         else {
02452                             /* last button in top row */
02453                             flag = UI_BUT_ALIGN_DOWN | UI_BUT_ALIGN_LEFT;
02454                         }
02455                     }
02456                     else 
02457                         flag |= UI_BUT_ALIGN_DOWN;
02458                 }
02459                 else 
02460                     flag |= UI_BUT_ALIGN_TOP;
02461             }
02462         }
02463         
02464         but->flag |= flag;
02465         
02466         /* merge coordinates */
02467         if (prev) {
02468             // simple cases 
02469             if (rows == 0) {
02470                 but->x1 = (prev->x2 + but->x1) / 2.0f;
02471                 prev->x2 = but->x1;
02472             }
02473             else if (cols == 0) {
02474                 but->y2 = (prev->y1 + but->y2) / 2.0f;
02475                 prev->y1 = but->y2;
02476             }
02477             else {
02478                 if (buts_are_horiz(prev, but)) {
02479                     but->x1 = (prev->x2 + but->x1) / 2.0f;
02480                     prev->x2 = but->x1;
02481                     /* copy height too */
02482                     but->y2 = prev->y2;
02483                 }
02484                 else if (prev->prev && buts_are_horiz(prev->prev, prev) == 0) {
02485                     /* the previous button is a single one in its row */
02486                     but->y2 = (prev->y1 + but->y2) / 2.0f;
02487                     prev->y1 = but->y2;
02488                     
02489                     but->x1 = prev->x1;
02490                     if (next && buts_are_horiz(but, next) == 0)
02491                         but->x2 = prev->x2;
02492                 }
02493                 else {
02494                     /* the previous button is not a single one in its row */
02495                     but->y2 = prev->y1;
02496                 }
02497             }
02498         }
02499     }
02500 }
02501 
02502 void ui_block_do_align(uiBlock *block)
02503 {
02504     uiBut *but;
02505     short nr;
02506 
02507     /* align buttons with same align nr */
02508     for (but = block->buttons.first; but; ) {
02509         if (but->alignnr) {
02510             nr = but->alignnr;
02511             ui_block_do_align_but(but, nr);
02512 
02513             /* skip with same number */
02514             for (; but && but->alignnr == nr; but = but->next) ;
02515 
02516             if (!but)
02517                 break;
02518         }
02519         else
02520             but = but->next;
02521     }
02522 }
02523 
02532 static uiBut *ui_def_but(uiBlock *block, int type, int retval, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, void *poin, float min, float max, float a1, float a2, const char *tip)
02533 {
02534     uiBut *but;
02535     int slen;
02536     
02537     if (type & BUTPOIN) {       /* a pointer is required */
02538         if (poin == NULL)
02539             return NULL;
02540     }
02541 
02542     but = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiBut), "uiBut");
02543 
02544     but->type = type & BUTTYPE;
02545     but->pointype = type & BUTPOIN;
02546     but->bit = type & BIT;
02547     but->bitnr = type & 31;
02548     but->icon = ICON_NONE;
02549     but->iconadd = 0;
02550 
02551     but->retval = retval;
02552 
02553     slen = strlen(str);
02554     if (slen >= UI_MAX_NAME_STR - 1) {
02555         but->str = MEM_mallocN(slen + 2, "ui_def_but str"); /* why +2 ? */
02556     }
02557     else {
02558         but->str = but->strdata;
02559     }
02560     memcpy(but->str, str, slen + 1);
02561 
02562     but->x1 = x1;
02563     but->y1 = y1;
02564     but->x2 = (x1 + x2);
02565     but->y2 = (y1 + y2);
02566 
02567     but->poin = poin;
02568     but->hardmin = but->softmin = min;
02569     but->hardmax = but->softmax = max;
02570     but->a1 = a1;
02571     but->a2 = a2;
02572     but->tip = tip;
02573 
02574     but->lock = block->lock;
02575     but->lockstr = block->lockstr;
02576     but->dt = block->dt;
02577 
02578     but->aspect = 1.0f; //XXX block->aspect;
02579     but->block = block;      // pointer back, used for frontbuffer status, and picker
02580 
02581     if ((block->flag & UI_BUT_ALIGN) && ui_but_can_align(but))
02582         but->alignnr = block->alignnr;
02583 
02584     but->func = block->func;
02585     but->func_arg1 = block->func_arg1;
02586     but->func_arg2 = block->func_arg2;
02587 
02588     but->funcN = block->funcN;
02589     if (block->func_argN)
02590         but->func_argN = MEM_dupallocN(block->func_argN);
02591     
02592     but->pos = -1;   /* cursor invisible */
02593 
02594     if (ELEM4(but->type, NUM, NUMABS, NUMSLI, HSVSLI)) {    /* add a space to name */
02595         /* slen remains unchanged from previous assignment, ensure this stays true */
02596         if (slen > 0 && slen < UI_MAX_NAME_STR - 2) {
02597             if (but->str[slen - 1] != ' ') {
02598                 but->str[slen] = ' ';
02599                 but->str[slen + 1] = 0;
02600             }
02601         }
02602     }
02603 
02604     if ((block->flag & UI_BLOCK_LOOP) || ELEM8(but->type, MENU, TEX, LABEL, IDPOIN, BLOCK, BUTM, SEARCH_MENU, PROGRESSBAR))
02605         but->flag |= (UI_TEXT_LEFT | UI_ICON_LEFT);
02606     else if (but->type == BUT_TOGDUAL)
02607         but->flag |= UI_ICON_LEFT;
02608 
02609     but->flag |= (block->flag & UI_BUT_ALIGN);
02610 
02611     if (but->lock) {
02612         if (but->lockstr) {
02613             but->flag |= UI_BUT_DISABLED;
02614         }
02615     }
02616 
02617     /* keep track of UI_interface.h */
02618     if (ELEM7(but->type, BLOCK, BUT, LABEL, PULLDOWN, ROUNDBOX, LISTBOX, BUTM)) ;
02619     else if (ELEM3(but->type, SCROLL, SEPR, FTPREVIEW)) ;
02620     else if (but->type >= SEARCH_MENU) ;
02621     else but->flag |= UI_BUT_UNDO;
02622 
02623     BLI_addtail(&block->buttons, but);
02624     
02625     if (block->curlayout)
02626         ui_layout_add_but(block->curlayout, but);
02627 
02628 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
02629     /* if the 'UI_OT_editsource' is running, extract the source info from the button  */
02630     if (UI_editsource_enable_check()) {
02631         UI_editsource_active_but_test(but);
02632     }
02633 #endif
02634 
02635     return but;
02636 }
02637 
02638 /* ui_def_but_rna_propname and ui_def_but_rna
02639  * both take the same args except for propname vs prop, this is done so we can
02640  * avoid an extra lookup on 'prop' when its already available.
02641  *
02642  * When this kind of change won't disrupt branches, best look into making more
02643  * of our UI functions take prop rather then propname.
02644  */
02645 
02646 #define UI_DEF_BUT_RNA_DISABLE(but) \
02647     but->flag |= UI_BUT_DISABLED; \
02648     but->lock = 1; \
02649     but->lockstr = ""
02650 
02651 
02652 static uiBut *ui_def_but_rna(uiBlock *block, int type, int retval, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA *prop, int index, float min, float max, float a1, float a2,  const char *tip)
02653 {
02654     const PropertyType proptype = RNA_property_type(prop);
02655     uiBut *but;
02656     int freestr = 0, icon = 0;
02657 
02658     /* use rna values if parameters are not specified */
02659     if (!str) {
02660         if (type == MENU && proptype == PROP_ENUM) {
02661             EnumPropertyItem *item;
02662             DynStr *dynstr;
02663             int i, totitem, value, free;
02664 
02665             RNA_property_enum_items_gettexted(block->evil_C, ptr, prop, &item, &totitem, &free);
02666             value = RNA_property_enum_get(ptr, prop);
02667 
02668             dynstr = BLI_dynstr_new();
02669             BLI_dynstr_appendf(dynstr, "%s%%t", RNA_property_ui_name(prop));
02670             for (i = 0; i < totitem; i++) {
02671                 if (!item[i].identifier[0]) {
02672                     if (item[i].name)
02673                         BLI_dynstr_appendf(dynstr, "|%s%%l", item[i].name);
02674                     else
02675                         BLI_dynstr_append(dynstr, "|%l");
02676                 }
02677                 else if (item[i].icon)
02678                     BLI_dynstr_appendf(dynstr, "|%s %%i%d %%x%d", item[i].name, item[i].icon, item[i].value);
02679                 else
02680                     BLI_dynstr_appendf(dynstr, "|%s %%x%d", item[i].name, item[i].value);
02681 
02682                 if (value == item[i].value)
02683                     icon = item[i].icon;
02684             }
02685             str = BLI_dynstr_get_cstring(dynstr);
02686             BLI_dynstr_free(dynstr);
02687 
02688             if (free) {
02689                 MEM_freeN(item);
02690             }
02691 
02692             freestr = 1;
02693         }
02694         else if (ELEM(type, ROW, LISTROW) && proptype == PROP_ENUM) {
02695             EnumPropertyItem *item;
02696             int i, totitem, free;
02697 
02698             RNA_property_enum_items_gettexted(block->evil_C, ptr, prop, &item, &totitem, &free);
02699             for (i = 0; i < totitem; i++) {
02700                 if (item[i].identifier[0] && item[i].value == (int)max) {
02701                     str = item[i].name;
02702                     icon = item[i].icon;
02703                 }
02704             }
02705 
02706             if (!str) {
02707                 str = RNA_property_ui_name(prop);
02708             }
02709             if (free) {
02710                 MEM_freeN(item);
02711             }
02712         }
02713         else {
02714             str = RNA_property_ui_name(prop);
02715             icon = RNA_property_ui_icon(prop);
02716         }
02717     }
02718 
02719     if (!tip && proptype != PROP_ENUM)
02720         tip = RNA_property_ui_description(prop);
02721 
02722     if (min == max || a1 == -1 || a2 == -1) {
02723         if (proptype == PROP_INT) {
02724             int hardmin, hardmax, softmin, softmax, step;
02725 
02726             RNA_property_int_range(ptr, prop, &hardmin, &hardmax);
02727             RNA_property_int_ui_range(ptr, prop, &softmin, &softmax, &step);
02728 
02729             if (!ELEM(type, ROW, LISTROW) && min == max) {
02730                 min = hardmin;
02731                 max = hardmax;
02732             }
02733             if (a1 == -1)
02734                 a1 = step;
02735             if (a2 == -1)
02736                 a2 = 0;
02737         }
02738         else if (proptype == PROP_FLOAT) {
02739             float hardmin, hardmax, softmin, softmax, step, precision;
02740 
02741             RNA_property_float_range(ptr, prop, &hardmin, &hardmax);
02742             RNA_property_float_ui_range(ptr, prop, &softmin, &softmax, &step, &precision);
02743 
02744             if (!ELEM(type, ROW, LISTROW) && min == max) {
02745                 min = hardmin;
02746                 max = hardmax;
02747             }
02748             if (a1 == -1)
02749                 a1 = step;
02750             if (a2 == -1)
02751                 a2 = precision;
02752         }
02753         else if (proptype == PROP_STRING) {
02754             min = 0;
02755             max = RNA_property_string_maxlength(prop);
02756             if (max == 0) /* interface code should ideally support unlimited length */
02757                 max = UI_MAX_DRAW_STR;
02758         }
02759     }
02760 
02761     /* now create button */
02762     but = ui_def_but(block, type, retval, str, x1, y1, x2, y2, NULL, min, max, a1, a2, tip);
02763 
02764     but->rnapoin = *ptr;
02765     but->rnaprop = prop;
02766 
02767     if (RNA_property_array_length(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop))
02768         but->rnaindex = index;
02769     else
02770         but->rnaindex = 0;
02771 
02772     if (icon) {
02773         but->icon = (BIFIconID)icon;
02774         but->flag |= UI_HAS_ICON;
02775         but->flag |= UI_ICON_LEFT;
02776     }
02777     
02778     if (!RNA_property_editable(&but->rnapoin, prop)) {
02779         UI_DEF_BUT_RNA_DISABLE(but);
02780     }
02781 
02782     if (but->flag & UI_BUT_UNDO && (ui_but_is_rna_undo(but) == FALSE)) {
02783         but->flag &= ~UI_BUT_UNDO;
02784     }
02785 
02786     /* If this button uses units, calculate the step from this */
02787     if ((proptype == PROP_FLOAT) && ui_is_but_unit(but)) {
02788         but->a1 = ui_get_but_step_unit(but, but->a1);
02789     }
02790 
02791     if (freestr) {
02792         MEM_freeN((void *)str);
02793     }
02794 
02795     return but;
02796 }
02797 
02798 static uiBut *ui_def_but_rna_propname(uiBlock *block, int type, int retval, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, PointerRNA *ptr, const char *propname, int index, float min, float max, float a1, float a2,  const char *tip)
02799 {
02800     PropertyRNA *prop = RNA_struct_find_property(ptr, propname);
02801     uiBut *but;
02802 
02803     if (prop) {
02804         but = ui_def_but_rna(block, type, retval, str, x1, y1, x2, y2, ptr, prop, index, min, max, a1, a2,  tip);
02805     }
02806     else {
02807         but = ui_def_but(block, type, retval, propname, x1, y1, x2, y2, NULL, min, max, a1, a2, tip);
02808 
02809         UI_DEF_BUT_RNA_DISABLE(but);
02810     }
02811 
02812     return but;
02813 }
02814 
02815 static uiBut *ui_def_but_operator_ptr(uiBlock *block, int type, wmOperatorType *ot, int opcontext, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, const char *tip)
02816 {
02817     uiBut *but;
02818 
02819     if (!str) {
02820         if (ot && ot->srna)
02821             str = RNA_struct_ui_name(ot->srna);
02822         else
02823             str = "";
02824     }
02825 
02826     if ((!tip || tip[0] == '\0') && ot && ot->srna) {
02827         tip = RNA_struct_ui_description(ot->srna);
02828     }
02829 
02830     but = ui_def_but(block, type, -1, str, x1, y1, x2, y2, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, tip);
02831     but->optype = ot;
02832     but->opcontext = opcontext;
02833     but->flag &= ~UI_BUT_UNDO; /* no need for ui_but_is_undo(), we never need undo here */
02834 
02835     if (!ot) {
02836         but->flag |= UI_BUT_DISABLED;
02837         but->lock = 1;
02838         but->lockstr = "";
02839     }
02840 
02841     return but;
02842 }
02843 
02844 #if 0 /* UNUSED */
02845 static uiBut *UNUSED_FUNCTION(ui_def_but_operator) (uiBlock * block, int type, const char *opname, int opcontext, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, const char *tip)
02846 {
02847     wmOperatorType *ot = WM_operatortype_find(opname, 0);
02848     if (str == NULL && ot == NULL) str = opname;
02849     return ui_def_but_operator_ptr(block, type, ot, opcontext, str, x1, y1, x2, y2, tip);

02853 static uiBut *ui_def_but_operator_text(uiBlock *block, int type, const char *opname, int opcontext, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, void *poin, float min, float max, float a1, float a2, const char *tip)
02854 {
02855     uiBut *but;
02856     wmOperatorType *ot;
02857     
02858     ot = WM_operatortype_find(opname, 0);
02859 
02860     if (!str) {
02861         if (ot) str = ot->name;
02862         else str = opname;
02863     }
02864     
02865     if ((!tip || tip[0] == '\0') && ot && ot->description) {
02866         tip = ot->description;
02867     }
02868 
02869     but = ui_def_but(block, type, -1, str, x1, y1, x2, y2, poin, min, max, a1, a2, tip);
02870     but->optype = ot;
02871     but->opcontext = opcontext;
02872     but->flag &= ~UI_BUT_UNDO; /* no need for ui_but_is_undo(), we never need undo here */
02873 
02874     if (!ot) {
02875         but->flag |= UI_BUT_DISABLED;
02876         but->lock = 1;
02877         but->lockstr = "";
02878     }
02879 
02880     return but;
02881 }
02882 
02883 uiBut *uiDefBut(uiBlock *block, int type, int retval, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, void *poin, float min, float max, float a1, float a2, const char *tip)
02884 {
02885     uiBut *but = ui_def_but(block, type, retval, str, x1, y1, x2, y2, poin, min, max, a1, a2, tip);
02886 
02887     ui_check_but(but);
02888     
02889     return but;
02890 }
02891 
02892 /* if _x_ is a power of two (only one bit) return the power,
02893  * otherwise return -1.
02894  * (1<<findBitIndex(x))==x for powers of two.
02895  */
02896 static int findBitIndex(unsigned int x)
02897 {
02898     if (!x || !is_power_of_2_i(x)) { /* is_power_of_2_i(x) strips lowest bit */
02899         return -1;
02900     }
02901     else {
02902         int idx = 0;
02903 
02904         if (x & 0xFFFF0000) idx += 16, x >>= 16;
02905         if (x & 0xFF00) idx += 8, x >>= 8;
02906         if (x & 0xF0) idx += 4, x >>= 4;
02907         if (x & 0xC) idx += 2, x >>= 2;
02908         if (x & 0x2) idx += 1;
02909 
02910         return idx;
02911     }
02912 }
02913 
02914 /* autocomplete helper functions */
02915 struct AutoComplete {
02916     size_t maxlen;
02917     char *truncate;
02918     const char *startname;
02919 };
02920 
02921 AutoComplete *autocomplete_begin(const char *startname, size_t maxlen)
02922 {
02923     AutoComplete *autocpl;
02924     
02925     autocpl = MEM_callocN(sizeof(AutoComplete), "AutoComplete");
02926     autocpl->maxlen = maxlen;
02927     autocpl->truncate = MEM_callocN(sizeof(char) * maxlen, "AutoCompleteTruncate");
02928     autocpl->startname = startname;
02929 
02930     return autocpl;
02931 }
02932 
02933 void autocomplete_do_name(AutoComplete *autocpl, const char *name)
02934 {
02935     char *truncate = autocpl->truncate;
02936     const char *startname = autocpl->startname;
02937     int a;
02938 
02939     for (a = 0; a < autocpl->maxlen - 1; a++) {
02940         if (startname[a] == 0 || startname[a] != name[a])
02941             break;
02942     }
02943     /* found a match */
02944     if (startname[a] == 0) {
02945         /* first match */
02946         if (truncate[0] == 0)
02947             BLI_strncpy(truncate, name, autocpl->maxlen);
02948         else {
02949             /* remove from truncate what is not in bone->name */
02950             for (a = 0; a < autocpl->maxlen - 1; a++) {
02951                 if (name[a] == 0) {
02952                     truncate[a] = 0;
02953                     break;
02954                 }
02955                 else if (truncate[a] != name[a])
02956                     truncate[a] = 0;
02957             }
02958         }
02959     }
02960 }
02961 
02962 void autocomplete_end(AutoComplete *autocpl, char *autoname)
02963 {   
02964     if (autocpl->truncate[0])
02965         BLI_strncpy(autoname, autocpl->truncate, autocpl->maxlen);
02966     else {
02967         if (autoname != autocpl->startname) /* don't copy a string over its self */
02968             BLI_strncpy(autoname, autocpl->startname, autocpl->maxlen);
02969     }
02970     MEM_freeN(autocpl->truncate);
02971     MEM_freeN(autocpl);
02972 }
02973 
02974 /* autocomplete callback for ID buttons */
02975 static void autocomplete_id(bContext *C, char *str, void *arg_v)
02976 {
02977     int blocktype = (intptr_t)arg_v;
02978     ListBase *listb = which_libbase(CTX_data_main(C), blocktype);
02979     
02980     if (listb == NULL) return;
02981     
02982     /* search if str matches the beginning of an ID struct */
02983     if (str[0]) {
02984         AutoComplete *autocpl = autocomplete_begin(str, MAX_ID_NAME - 2);
02985         ID *id;
02986         
02987         for (id = listb->first; id; id = id->next)
02988             autocomplete_do_name(autocpl, id->name + 2);
02989 
02990         autocomplete_end(autocpl, str);
02991     }
02992 }
02993 
02994 static void ui_check_but_and_iconize(uiBut *but, int icon)
02995 {
02996     if (icon) {
02997         but->icon = (BIFIconID) icon;
02998         but->flag |= UI_HAS_ICON;
02999     }
03000 
03001     ui_check_but(but);
03002 }
03003 
03004 static uiBut *uiDefButBit(uiBlock *block, int type, int bit, int retval, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, void *poin, float min, float max, float a1, float a2,  const char *tip)
03005 {
03006     int bitIdx = findBitIndex(bit);
03007     if (bitIdx == -1) {
03008         return NULL;
03009     }
03010     else {
03011         return uiDefBut(block, type | BIT | bitIdx, retval, str, x1, y1, x2, y2, poin, min, max, a1, a2, tip);
03012     }
03013 }
03014 uiBut *uiDefButF(uiBlock *block, int type, int retval, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, float *poin, float min, float max, float a1, float a2,  const char *tip)
03015 {
03016     return uiDefBut(block, type | FLO, retval, str, x1, y1, x2, y2, (void *) poin, min, max, a1, a2, tip);
03017 }
03018 uiBut *uiDefButBitF(uiBlock *block, int type, int bit, int retval, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, float *poin, float min, float max, float a1, float a2,  const char *tip)
03019 {
03020     return uiDefButBit(block, type | FLO, bit, retval, str, x1, y1, x2, y2, (void *) poin, min, max, a1, a2, tip);
03021 }
03022 uiBut *uiDefButI(uiBlock *block, int type, int retval, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, int *poin, float min, float max, float a1, float a2,  const char *tip)
03023 {
03024     return uiDefBut(block, type | INT, retval, str, x1, y1, x2, y2, (void *) poin, min, max, a1, a2, tip);
03025 }
03026 uiBut *uiDefButBitI(uiBlock *block, int type, int bit, int retval, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, int *poin, float min, float max, float a1, float a2,  const char *tip)
03027 {
03028     return uiDefButBit(block, type | INT, bit, retval, str, x1, y1, x2, y2, (void *) poin, min, max, a1, a2, tip);
03029 }
03030 uiBut *uiDefButS(uiBlock *block, int type, int retval, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, short *poin, float min, float max, float a1, float a2,  const char *tip)
03031 {
03032     return uiDefBut(block, type | SHO, retval, str, x1, y1, x2, y2, (void *) poin, min, max, a1, a2, tip);
03033 }
03034 uiBut *uiDefButBitS(uiBlock *block, int type, int bit, int retval, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, short *poin, float min, float max, float a1, float a2,  const char *tip)
03035 {
03036     return uiDefButBit(block, type | SHO, bit, retval, str, x1, y1, x2, y2, (void *) poin, min, max, a1, a2, tip);
03037 }
03038 uiBut *uiDefButC(uiBlock *block, int type, int retval, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, char *poin, float min, float max, float a1, float a2,  const char *tip)
03039 {
03040     return uiDefBut(block, type | CHA, retval, str, x1, y1, x2, y2, (void *) poin, min, max, a1, a2, tip);

03089 static uiBut *uiDefIconButBit(uiBlock *block, int type, int bit, int retval, int icon, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, void *poin, float min, float max, float a1, float a2, const char *tip)

03242 
03243 void uiSetButLink(uiBut *but, void **poin, void ***ppoin, short *tot, int from, int to)
03244 {
03245     uiLink *link;
03246     
03247     link = but->link = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiLink), "new uilink");
03248     
03249     link->poin = poin;
03250     link->ppoin = ppoin;
03251     link->totlink = tot;
03252     link->fromcode = from;
03253     link->tocode = to;
03254 }
03255 
03256 /* cruft to make uiBlock and uiBut private */
03257 
03258 int uiBlocksGetYMin(ListBase *lb)
03259 {
03260     uiBlock *block;
03261     int min = 0;
03262     
03263     for (block = lb->first; block; block = block->next)
03264         if (block == lb->first || block->miny < min)
03265             min = block->miny;
03266             
03267     return min;
03268 }
03269 
03270 void uiBlockSetDirection(uiBlock *block, int direction)
03271 {
03272     block->direction = direction;
03273 }
03274 
03275 /* this call escapes if there's alignment flags */
03276 void uiBlockFlipOrder(uiBlock *block)
03277 {
03278     ListBase lb;
03279     uiBut *but, *next;
03280     float centy, miny = 10000, maxy = -10000;
03281 
03282     if (U.uiflag & USER_MENUFIXEDORDER)
03283         return;
03284     else if (block->flag & UI_BLOCK_NO_FLIP)
03285         return;
03286     
03287     for (but = block->buttons.first; but; but = but->next) {
03288         if (but->flag & UI_BUT_ALIGN) return;
03289         if (but->y1 < miny) miny = but->y1;
03290         if (but->y2 > maxy) maxy = but->y2;
03291     }
03292     /* mirror trick */
03293     centy = (miny + maxy) / 2.0f;
03294     for (but = block->buttons.first; but; but = but->next) {
03295         but->y1 = centy - (but->y1 - centy);
03296         but->y2 = centy - (but->y2 - centy);
03297         SWAP(float, but->y1, but->y2);
03298     }
03299     
03300     /* also flip order in block itself, for example for arrowkey */
03301     lb.first = lb.last = NULL;
03302     but = block->buttons.first;
03303     while (but) {
03304         next = but->next;
03305         BLI_remlink(&block->buttons, but);
03306         BLI_addtail(&lb, but);
03307         but = next;
03308     }
03309     block->buttons = lb;
03310 }

03382 PointerRNA *uiButGetOperatorPtrRNA(uiBut *but)
03383 {
03384     if (but->optype && !but->opptr) {
03385         but->opptr = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PointerRNA), "uiButOpPtr");
03386         WM_operator_properties_create_ptr(but->opptr, but->optype);
03387     }
03388 
03389     return but->opptr;
03390 }
03391 
03392 void uiButSetUnitType(uiBut *but, const int unit_type)
03393 {
03394     but->unit_type = (unsigned char)(RNA_SUBTYPE_UNIT_VALUE(unit_type));
03395 }
03396 
03397 int uiButGetUnitType(uiBut *but)
03398 {
03399     int ownUnit = (int)but->unit_type;
03400     
03401     /* own unit define always takes precedence over RNA provided, allowing for overriding 
03402      * default value provided in RNA in a few special cases (i.e. Active Keyframe in Graph Edit)
03403      */
03404     // XXX: this doesn't allow clearing unit completely, though the same could be said for icons
03405     if ((ownUnit != 0) || (but->rnaprop == NULL)) {
03406         return ownUnit << 16;
03407     }
03408     else {
03409         return RNA_SUBTYPE_UNIT(RNA_property_subtype(but->rnaprop));
03410     }
03411 }

03433 {

03435         MEM_freeN(block->func_argN);
03436     }
03437

03439     block->func_argN = argN;
03440     block->func_arg2 = arg2;
03441 }

03480 uiBut *uiDefIDPoinBut(uiBlock *block, uiIDPoinFuncFP func, short blocktype, int retval, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, void *idpp, const char *tip)
03481 {
03482     uiBut *but = ui_def_but(block, IDPOIN, retval, str, x1, y1, x2, y2, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, tip);
03483     but->idpoin_func = func;
03484     but->idpoin_idpp = (ID **) idpp;
03485     ui_check_but(but);
03486     
03487     if (blocktype)
03488         uiButSetCompleteFunc(but, autocomplete_id, (void *)(intptr_t)blocktype);
03489 
03490     return but;
03491 }

03560 /* Block button containing both string label and icon */
03561 uiBut *uiDefIconTextBlockBut(uiBlock *block, uiBlockCreateFunc func, void *arg, int icon, const char *str, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, const char *tip)
03562 {
03563     uiBut *but = ui_def_but(block, BLOCK, 0, str, x1, y1, x2, y2, arg, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, tip);
03564     
03565     /* XXX temp, old menu calls pass on icon arrow, which is now UI_ICON_SUBMENU flag */
03566     if (icon != ICON_RIGHTARROW_THIN) {
03567         but->icon = (BIFIconID) icon;
03568         but->flag |= UI_ICON_LEFT;
03569     }
03570     but->flag |= UI_HAS_ICON;
03571     but->flag |= UI_ICON_SUBMENU;
03572 
03573     but->block_create_func = func;
03574     ui_check_but(but);
03575     
03576     return but;
03577 }

03613 /* arg is pointer to string/name, use uiButSetSearchFunc() below to make this work */
03614 /* here a1 and a2, if set, control thumbnail preview rows/cols */
03615 uiBut *uiDefSearchBut(uiBlock *block, void *arg, int retval, int icon, int maxlen, int x1, int y1, short x2, short y2, float a1, float a2, const char *tip)
03616 {
03617     uiBut *but = ui_def_but(block, SEARCH_MENU, retval, "", x1, y1, x2, y2, arg, 0.0, maxlen, a1, a2, tip);
03618     
03619     but->icon = (BIFIconID) icon;
03620     but->flag |= UI_HAS_ICON;
03621     
03622     but->flag |= UI_ICON_LEFT | UI_TEXT_LEFT;
03623     
03624     ui_check_but(but);
03625     
03626     return but;
03627 }

03629 
03630 /* arg is user value, searchfunc and handlefunc both get it as arg */
03631 /* if active set, button opens with this item visible and selected */
03632 void uiButSetSearchFunc(uiBut *but, uiButSearchFunc sfunc, void *arg, uiButHandleFunc bfunc, void *active)
03633 {
03634     but->search_func = sfunc;
03635     but->search_arg = arg;
03636     
03637     uiButSetFunc(but, bfunc, arg, active);
03638     
03639     /* search buttons show red-alert if item doesn't exist, not for menus */
03640     if (0 == (but->block->flag & UI_BLOCK_LOOP)) {
03641         /* skip empty buttons, not all buttons need input, we only show invalid */
03642         if (but->drawstr[0])
03643             ui_but_search_test(but);
03644     }
03645 }
03646 
03647 /* push a new event onto event queue to activate the given button 
03648  * (usually a text-field) upon entering a popup
03649  */
03650 void uiButSetFocusOnEnter(wmWindow *win, uiBut *but)
03651 {
03652     wmEvent event;
03653     
03654     event = *(win->eventstate);
03655     event.type = EVT_BUT_OPEN;
03656     event.val = KM_PRESS;
03657     event.customdata = but;
03658     event.customdatafree = FALSE;
03659     
03660     wm_event_add(win, &event);
03661 }
